text: This is a list of Texas Longhorns men's basketball players who played at least one game in the National Basketball Association (NBA). Kevin Durant in 2011. He won the 2013–14 NBA Most Valuable Player Award and 2012, 2019 NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player. LaMarcus Aldridge, a current member of the San Antonio Spurs.
